name: Nerve Mobile VR
description:
The app it self is for mobile devices with Mobile VR functions as well and can be used with a remote for movement

While the Project itself is a working prototype it, it involved around the idea of treating people's fears and Phobia's.

Please note: The current build has minor/major bugs in it as its currently in testing and will be rebuilt

Documents are included with this project include Uni presentation and Documentation 

The App Created by Aaron Ellacott & James Beuvink
